Commands.Sparkstrike: 3-HIT BRV attack  Grants 「Ravager」 for 3 turns and removes 「Commando」  Lowers Action Delay if target is broken   「Ravager」 raises Max BRV and Speed
Commands.Flourish of Steel: 3-HIT BRV+HP attack  Grants 「Commando」 stance for 3 turns and removes 「Ravager」  Lowers Action Delay if target is broken   「Commando」 raises Max BRV and Attack
Commands.Army of One: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack  Followed by a 2-HIT BRV+HP attack  Followed by another 2-HIT BRV+HP attack  Raises BRV potency if target is broken  Restores own HP based on total HP damage dealt up to 10% Max HP  If the healing amount exceeds Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV  Delays the target by 1 turn  Grants 「Knight of Etro」 for 3 turns  Doesn't consume ability use on the next turn   While 「Ravager」 is active:  - Turns to 「Army of One+」   「Knight of Etro」 has the following effects:  - Grants Thunder Enchant  - Raises Max BRV and Attack  - When target is broken, nullifies Action Delay and grants a free turn that doesn't increase the turn count
Commands.Army of One+: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack  Followed by a 2-HIT BRV+HP attack  Followed by another 2-HIT BRV+HP attack  Raises BRV potency if target is broken  Restores own HP based on total HP damage dealt up to 10% Max HP  If the healing amount exceeds Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV  Delays the target by 2 turns  Grants 「Knight of Etro」 for 3 turns  Doesn't consume ability use on the next turn
